title: verify sync of app_tagging.json to dp pool machines
custom_summary: verify sync of app_tagging.json to dp pool machines
custom_preconds:
1. tenant webui should accessible
2. client should be up and running
custom_steps:
steps:
1.login to webui
2.Go to Policies->Real time Protection
3.Click New Policy -> Public app Access
4.create block cci policy with category one or two categories and predefined & custom tag(cloud storage, socail etc)
5. check app_tagging.json under /opt/ns/pop/US-SV5/cfg$
custom_expected: the required file should be synced to dp pool machines
